Networking Fundraiser

Enter below for a chance to win a trip to Manhattan and a dinner with Jared Kaye, Managing Director at J.P. Morgan Investment Banking. Getting to meet an individual who works so closely with Yale will certainly be an incredible experience.

When? February 12th

Where? New York City

TO ENTER: Please sponsor one of our initiatives below. All money raised will go toward our education goals to provide free resources (such as Wall Street Journal subscriptions and books) and opportunities for our members to connect with professionals.

Hoodie
